text: Aadam (alh-e-salam) kay dono beton ka khara khara haal bhi enhen suna do unn dono ney aik nazrana paish kiya inn mein say aik ki nazar qabool hogaee aur doosray ki maqbool na hui to woh kehney laga mein tujhay maar hi daalon ga uss ney kaha Allah Taalaa taqwa walon ka hi amal qabool kerta hai
